serviceArea: Washington NC, Greenville NC, and surrounding Eastern North Carolina
shortDescription: Professional pest removal and mold remediation specialists serving Eastern North Carolina. Crawl space encapsulation, termite treatment, and moisture control.
longDescription: At Marks Termite & Pest Control, Inc. in Washington, North Carolina, we specialize in pest removal and mold remediation so that your home or business is not only pest-free but safe. Mold is also a serious issue in many homes, and most people might not even be aware that mold lurks under your crawl space. We offer the ultimate solution for any damp, musty, moldy crawlspace. Utilizing a revolutionary encapsulation system, we can totally eliminate moisture from your crawl space by creating a vapor barrier. No moisture means goodbye mold and mildew! Our team members are well-trained and use state-of-the-art technology.

promotions.offer: $250 off Total Encapsulation & Full Moisture Control

locations.name: Washington (Main)
locations.address: 145 P and G Ln, Washington, NC 27889

notes: HubSpot indicated 'NO' website but business actually has markstermiteandpestcontrol.net. Also known as 'The Moisture Man' on Facebook. BBB accredited with two locations. HubSpot phone (252-945-8595) differs from website (252-940-0300) - may be alternate line. Now offering financing.
